title: 追凶1992
description: After the death of her husband in a strange explosion, Amparo begins to search for answers with the only help of Richi, a security guard, ex-cop and alcoholic. While the murders always follow the same pattern.

title: Filthy Animals
description: Two outlaw misfits, Lars, a thrill-seeking drug enthusiast, and Freddy, a bodybuilder recently out of rehab, hunt down child sexual predators on Christmas Eve.

title: 指环王：洛汗之战
english_title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim (2024)
country: 美国 日本 新西兰
description: A sudden attack by Wulf, a clever and ruthless Dunlending lord seeking vengeance for the death of his father, forces Helm Hammerhand, the King of Rohan, and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg.

title: 阿甘妙世界 电影版
english_title: The Amazing World of Gumball the movie (2025)
description: Gumball's biggest fan finds the lost episode of the show and accidentally opens a portal that connects his world to Gumball's cartoon world.

title: 达荷美
country: 法国 塞内加尔 贝宁
description: The journey of 26 plundered royal treasures from the Kingdom of Dahomey exhibited in Paris, now being returned to Benin. Diop artistically voices a new generation's demands.

title: Hanukkah on the Rocks
description: A recently unemployed lawyer Tory embarks on a journey to find Hanukkah candles, leading her to a Chicago bar where she transforms the holiday spirit, and finds the courage to pursue a new path in life.

title: 九月五日
description: During the 1972 Munich Olympics, an American sports broadcasting crew finds itself thrust into covering the hostage crisis involving Israeli athletes.

title: 随身危机
description: A mysterious traveler blackmails a young TSA agent into letting a dangerous package slip through security and onto a Christmas Day flight.

title: The Bibi Files
description: An inside look into the corruption charges against Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu through leaked police interrogation videos.

title: Trap City
description: Rapper caught in drug trade becomes overnight sensation with viral hit song. Facing prison, he must choose between his rising fame and testifying against a dangerous criminal.

title: 埃尔顿·约翰：永远不迟
description: 回顾传奇摇滚巨星埃尔顿·约翰50年来的音乐生涯。从缔造无数舞台传奇，到陷入痛苦低潮，经历挣扎蜕变后，成为音乐界传奇巨星。

title: Forbidden Desire
description: Agatha and Ubel are lovers, but because of their toxic relationship they end up parting ways. Eventually, Agatha meets a new lover but she can't get enough of Ubel. They continue their illicit affair
